781f5e44-1044-4f95-b439-9756b26c5aa9.name: Cowardice
781f5e44-1044-4f95-b439-9756b26c5aa9.notes: Make a self-control roll any time you are called on to risk physical danger. Roll at -5 if you must risk death.

ab9b0320-2109-4b6f-bbbc-64201ac62711.name: Curious

toward those you are jealous of (may be as much as -4, at GM's discretion)
from victims of your intolerance (may be as much as -5, at GM's discretion)
from others in any situation where No Sense of Humor becomes evident

a0bce89d-0f03-4b6c-97b8-c98e83c25f8c.name: Overconfidence
a0bce89d-0f03-4b6c-97b8-c98e83c25f8c.notes: You must make a self-control roll any time the GM feels you show an unreasonable degree of caution. If you fail, you must go ahead as though you were able to handle the situation!

features.situation: from young or naive individuals who believe you are as good as you say you are
from experienced NPCs

ad11bb62-d02b-4063-b8bd-59d2ff8385e9.name: Sadism
ad11bb62-d02b-4063-b8bd-59d2ff8385e9.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you have an opportunity to indulge your desires and know you shouldn’t (e.g., because the prisoner is one who should be released unharmed). If you fail, you cannot restrain yourself.

features.situation: from those who become aware of your Sadism unless they are from a culture that holds life in little esteem

6f856c92-1a1d-4a57-8d56-5be74374ce36.name: Selfish
6f856c92-1a1d-4a57-8d56-5be74374ce36.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you experience a clear social slight or “snub.” On a failure, you lash out at the offending party just as if you had Bad Temper.
